data.persona: I am a member of the village. I love to see my fellow townspeople. All of my family lives in the same village as I.
data.description:
You are in the Apothecary.
The Apothecary is filled with scores of scores of glass bottles. Each is a different color and has a different concoction. Scales and other types of medical devices line the shelves. There are many beakers and measuring devices. There is an entire walls with bags filled with different colored powders. There is a huge table in the middle.
The king is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a Clothes.

data.short_motivation: I want to greet the king
data.mid_motivation: I hope to sell a lot to the king today
data.long_motivation: I hope to expand quickly in the coming months with the patronage of the king
